attributes.action: Condemn the actions of the Indian Government in Jammu and Kashmir.
attributes.additional_details:
BBC News - Kashmir dispute: UN 'deeply concerned' over restrictions
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-india-49273999

BBC News - Kashmir dispute: Hundreds detained as anger grows
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-india-49277021

'Kashmiris will erupt': fear grips region as Indian crackdown bites
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2019/aug/09/kashmiris-will-erupt-fear-grips-region-as-indian-crackdown-bites
attributes.background: After the Indian Government revoked Article 370, Indian security forces have fired tear gas and shot live rounds to disperse thousands of people demonstrating against the stripping of the region's autonomy. We call upon the UK Government to condemn the actions of the Indian Government.
